data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Yan, Huang, Yong (2017): One new species and one new combination of the family Xyalidae (Nematoda: Monhysterida) from the East China Sea. Zootaxa 4306 (3): 401-410, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.3.6|2 occurrences
